problem_text: Do there exist finitely generated branch groups (see 15.12) a) that are non-amenable? c) that contain F2? d) that have exponential growth? L. Bartholdi, R. I. Grigorchuk, Z. ˇSuni´k
answer: a), c), d) Such groups do exist (S. Sidki, J. S. Wilson, Arch. Math., 80, no. 5 (2003), 458–463).
